Title: Lens
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Margaret Qualley
Plot: Nora is irritated by unexpected visitors. Kevin's predicament becomes impossible to ignore. Erika finds an unlikely ally and reveals haunting secrets.
